rooms.description: Spacious entry leading to an open living area with traditional Chettinad style wood paneling, intricate lattice work, and a central chandelier. The living area is arranged for social gatherings.
Functional kitchen designed with modern amenities integrated into the traditional layout. It includes an open concept adjoining dining area and a small pantry space.
Adjacent to the kitchen with seating for family gatherings, ensuring a smooth flow between cooking and dining areas.
A comfortable guest bedroom featuring built-in storage and a balcony overlooking the garden area. Balcony is designed with privacy in mind.
A dedicated gym space on ground floor offering privacy, fitted with modular workout equipment and natural lighting through skylights. Designed following ergonomic principles for fitness.

openings.description: A traditional Chettinad archway leading into the entrance hall with natural ventilation and lighting.
Door connecting the guest bedroom to its private balcony.
Separate door for direct access to the private gym from the ground floor.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed with a private balcony, king-size bed area and built-in closets. The layout emphasizes Vastu alignment for prosperity and health.
Chettinad style bedroom with traditional carvings and a balcony to enjoy morning sunlight and fresh air. Designed with Vastu principles for harmony.
Additional bedroom featuring an adjoining private balcony. The design emphasizes privacy while incorporating traditional motifs.
A dedicated study area with ample natural light and storage spaces. The room integrates modern amenities in a traditional Chettinad aesthetic.

openings.description: A wide staircase connecting the ground floor to the first floor, designed with safety features and natural light.
Door from master bedroom leading to its balcony.
